content.rendered:
Application information is now available for various  University of La Verne faculty development and funding opportunities. Completed applications and nominations are due to the Provost Office in Founders Hall 106 on Friday, February 14, 2020.

Downloads

  • Excellence in Teaching Award
  • Johnson Service Award
  • Sabbatical Leave (Faculty Handbook, Section 7.1)
  • Faculty Research Grant (evaluated by the La Verne Academy)
  • Faculty-Student Research Grant (evaluated by the La Verne Academy)
